Title: Program Terminology Standardization
Problem_Statement: Q100 introduces novel concepts (BWB, H₂, neural) lacking standardized aerospace definitions; inconsistent terminology creates ambiguity
Scope_In: Core program terms; H₂/BWB vocabulary; OPT-IN framework terms
Scope_Out: Domain-specific terms defined in respective ATA chapters

Title: Document Architecture Conventions
Problem_Statement: Documentation spans S1000D CSDB and ATA iSpec 2200 within OPT-IN framework; conventions needed for numbering, versioning, cross-referencing
Scope_In: Document ID syntax; version control conventions; folder structure rules
Scope_Out: Specific document content; S1000D schema definitions

Title: Safety Labeling Standards
Problem_Statement: H₂ propulsion introduces hazards (cryogenic burns, asphyxiation, flammability) not covered by conventional aircraft warning standards
Scope_In: Warning/caution/note formatting; H₂ hazard symbols; color conventions
Scope_Out: Specific hazard content (defined per system in LC03)

Title: Cross-Reference System Design
Problem_Statement: OPT-IN framework spans 5 axes, 79 ATA chapters, 14 LC categories; systematic cross-reference architecture needed for traceability; system shall remain human-readable without tooling
Scope_In: Reference syntax; hyperlink conventions; trace matrix structure

Title: Unit Systems and Conversions
Problem_Statement: International ops require SI; FAA uses imperial; H₂-specific units need standardized presentation and conversion factors
Scope_In: Primary/secondary unit convention; conversion tables; display precision

Title: IETP Runtime Validation and Testing
Problem_Statement: IETP Runtime components (MediaEmbed, Tooltip, Popup, CollapsibleSection, DynamicLink, MarkdownViewer) require comprehensive testing across browsers, devices, and interaction scenarios to ensure production readiness and compliance with accessibility standards
Scope_In: Browser compatibility testing (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, mobile); responsive behavior verification; component interaction testing; performance validation; accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA); error handling validation
Scope_Out: Implementation of new IETP features; specific ATA chapter content creation; automated testing infrastructure beyond manual validation
